build.buildCommand: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix frontend && npm run type-check --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

deploy.startCommand: bash -c 'if [ -d backend ]; then cd backend && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT; else export PYTHONPATH="$PWD:$PYTHONPATH" && uvicorn backend.app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT; fi'
